programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.desc: The Battle of Florida rolls on as the Lightning host the Panthers for Game 2 of their Eastern Conference quarterfinal. Florida set the tone with a commanding 6-2 verdict in Game 1. Matthew Tkachuk (FLA) returned from injured reserve with two goals.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Tampa Bay Lightning at Florida Panthers
programme.sub-title: Tampa Bay Lightning at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The defending Stanley Cup champion Panthers try to take a commanding lead on the rival Lightning in Game 3 of their East quarterfinal. Florida seized control of the series with a workmanlike 2-0 victory in Game 2 behind 19 saves by Sergei Bobrovsky.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Tampa Bay Lightning at Florida Panthers
programme.sub-title: Tampa Bay Lightning at Florida Panthers
programme.desc: The Lightning go for the equalizer in Game 4 of their East quarterfinal against the Panthers. Tampa Bay trails 2-1 in the series after a 5-1 victory in Game 3 that included Florida's Matthew Tkachuk receiving a five-minute major for interference.

programme.title: NHL Hockey Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.sub-title: Florida Panthers at Tampa Bay Lightning
programme.desc: The Panthers visit the Lightning for Game 5 of their East quarterfinal. Tampa Bay scored twice in 11 seconds during the second period of Game 4, but Florida used its own 11-second outburst to leap ahead and secure a 4-2 win, and a 3-1 series lead.
